about_the_game:
Welcome to Undercover Animals!
Are you ready to dive into a party game filled with strategy and suspense? In Undercover Animals, you will take on the role of a mysterious animal, hiding among other players. Through clever communication and precise judgment, you’ll uncover the identities of your opponents and achieve your unique objectives. Whether you excel at deception, deduction, or teamwork, this game promises thrilling showdowns and endless fun.

Game Features

  • Up to 12 Players: Supports 5 to 12 players, offering endless fun for both small gatherings and large parties.
  • Survival in the Shrinking Zone: As the game progresses, the map’s shrinking zone will force players into increasingly confined spaces for a life-and-death struggle. You must adapt quickly, keep moving, and find the perfect moment to strike down your enemies.
  • Keyword Mechanism: Each game randomly selects a keyword type. The keyword type consists of related and unique words. Players need to cleverly describe these words to convey information, identify teammates, and defeat opponents without revealing their identities. The choice of keyword types and words ensures that every game is full of variety and challenge.
  • Factions and Victory Goals: In the game, players are divided into multiple opposing factions. Each faction’s goal is to work together to defeat other factions. Players need to identify their teammates by acquiring the same keyword and work with them to fight against their enemies. In addition to these opposing factions, there are also Neutral players who do not belong to any fixed faction and aim to be the last survivor. Whether you are a member of a faction or a Neutral player, clever strategies and accurate judgment are key to winning the game.
  • Diverse Gameplay Rules: Besides the default faction-based rules, you can choose from several rule sets such as All Neutral or All Unique Keywords, ensuring that each game offers a fresh experience.
  • Varied Map Selection: Explore a variety of environments, from dense forests to mysterious swamps. Each map offers different challenges and strategies.
  • Customizable Game Options: Freely adjust game settings, including team configurations, keyword types, and gameplay rule weights, allowing every game to suit your and your friends’ preferences.

A Blend of Social Deduction and Survival Strategy

Undercover Animals is more than just a survival game—it’s a test of social deduction. Players must use subtle descriptions, sharp judgment, and timely betrayals to hide their true identities while uncovering others' intentions. Each game presents a new challenge, with different opponents and keywords. Experience dynamic strategy battles with friends and see if you can successfully achieve your goals and emerge as the ultimate winner.

Create Your Unique Experience

Whether you’re new to social deduction games or looking to test your survival skills, Undercover Animals offers a one-of-a-kind experience. With customizable keywords and game settings, you can create a gameplay style that’s uniquely yours. Every match is an exciting journey filled with the unknown and the unexpected.

Join Undercover Animals and discover your path to victory in this battle of wits and strategy!

  • OS: Windows 10 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 2GB / AMD Radeon RX 560 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Microphone required

short_description: This is a party game where each player has a secret identity. Use descriptions to hide your team and guess others' identities. As the danger zone shrinks, collect items, defeat enemies, and avoid harming teammates! Neutral players aim to eliminate everyone. Use strategy to win!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Hungarian, Turkish, Czech, Japanese, Polish, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Vietnamese, Korean
